      • htmlEncode

        public static java.lang.String htmlEncode(java.lang.String s)
        Encodes the string using HTML entities. The five standard XML entities are replaced and additionally backslashes and linefeeds are encoded.
        Parameters:
        s - The string to encode.
        Returns:
        The encoded string.
